feed.title: Kener Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

Features

Added TCP monitors

Breaking Changes

Ping monitors will break.

Fixes

Bug fixes in the UI

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.9...3.0.10

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add Norwegian (Bokmål) as an available locale by @VincentDatrier in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/253
  • feat: small improvements by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/256
  • fix: handle ping migration by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/261

New Contributors

  • @VincentDatrier made their first contribution in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/253

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.10...3.0.11

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.0.12

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.11...3.0.12

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.1.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • refactor(docker): multi-arch docker 🐳 build overhaul 🏗️ by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/258
  • fix: multi-arch docker build by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/267
  • fix: README generation by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/268
  • feat: test monitors in manage monitor dashboard by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/265

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.0.12...3.1.0

entry.title: New release for Kener: 3.1.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: CI/CD README generation pipeline by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/270
  • fix: README build by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/271
  • fix: missing versions artifact by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/272
  • manual readme update by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/273
  • manual readme update by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/274
  • fix: README generation by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/278
  • fix: protect-readme workflow by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/279
  • fix(gha): generate-readme by @kaffolder7 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/283
  • feat: Updates CSS and Svelte components by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/284
  • fix: update site metadata and image references for clarity by @rajnandan1 in https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/pull/286

Full Changelog: https://github.com/rajnandan1/kener/compare/3.1.0...3.1.1
